column1: Hello Travelers,Colleen from the Tripadvisor Content Team here! As of Monday 3/9/2020 Tripadvisor posted a global guide to the Coronavirius (Covid-19) off of it’s homepage. This guide is to serve as a place for general information on the outbreak and effects on travel from a global perspective (see page here: https://www.tripadvisor.com/COVID-2019 ). For TA to continue to provide the most up to date information for travelers, we are actively encouraging individuals to visit destination forum pages for more information for specific countries. We know that many destination forums already have threads discussing the implications of Covid-19, but I plan to pin new threads to each of the following Destination Forums today, which will reference any existing threads, the global guide, and a recommendation of content to discuss. This effort will be on-going, so the countries we are tackling today may change as we get more information on Covid-19. Additionally, we at TA are hoping to use this effort to shed light not only on the disruptions or closures in these cities, but also how to continue to support these local economies during this situation. Countries that will be posted in: China, Korea, Singapore, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Italy, IranIf you are a contributor in any of these locations, we would greatly appreciate any insights you could provide within the thread I post.Thank you so very much for your time and all of your contributions.ColleenTripadvisor Content Team
